page.title: 16HOUSING. (part 2)
page.content:
Survey of Roden St. & Parsonage Rd. Total Population: 468 Total Adults: 293 Total Children: 175
37% of Adult pop. are Protestants 63% of Adult pop. are Roman Catholics When total population were included, 33.5% were Protestants 66.5% were Roman Catholics.
Kircubbin has grown up as a modern market town serving the Mid-Ards. Its growth began in the 1790's and by the middle of the 19th. century had a population of 600. It's name was derived from Kilcubyn or Kilcooby former townland names. Currently it is growing faster than any other village in the Ards, especially the Parsonage Road development.
